name: Moon Reach
description:
Welcome to Moon Reach, a platform game where you have to survive obstacles and collect resources to build and fuel your rocket.  You get 1 Gold per mile reached, which can be spent on upgrading your rocket at Ground Control HQ.  To complete the game you must reach the Moon.

Controls:  Left/Right arrow keys to move, Space to jump, and use your mouse to click on Launch/Upgrade buttons.

Created for Game-Off 2020 game jam, theme:  Moonshot.
